edu.stanford.cs.pptx.code

Class PPValueTag

  • Object
    • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.PPShape
      • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.PPGroup
        • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.code.PPValueTag

  • public class PPValueTag
extends PPGroup
    This class represents a value that labels the value of an expression in a stack frame. The tag hangs below a code region and consists of a line and an oval callout.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PPValueTag(Rectangle2D bb, Object value)
      Creates a new value tag below the specified rectangle with the indicated value.

      Creates a new value tag below the specified rectangle with the indicated value.
      PPValueTag(Rectangle2D bb, Object value, double width, double height)
      Creates a new value tag below the specified rectangle with the indicated value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PPValueTag

        public PPValueTag(Rectangle2D bb,
                  Object value)
        Creates a new value tag below the specified rectangle with the indicated value.
        Parameters:
        bb - The bounding box around the code this tag marks
        value - The value displayed in the oval

      • PPValueTag

        public PPValueTag(Rectangle2D bb,
                  Object value,
                  double width)
        Creates a new value tag below the specified rectangle with the indicated value. This version allows the client to set the width of the oval.
        Parameters:
        bb - The bounding box around the code this tag marks
        value - The value displayed in the oval
        width - The width of the oval

      • PPValueTag

        public PPValueTag(Rectangle2D bb,
                  Object value,
                  double width,
                  double height)
        Creates a new value tag below the specified rectangle with the indicated value. This version allows the client to set the size of the oval.
        Parameters:
        bb - The bounding box around the code this tag marks
        value - The value displayed in the oval
        width - The width of the oval
        height - The height of the oval

    • Method Detail

      • setFillColor

        public void setFillColor(Color color)
        Sets the fill color of the value tag.
        Parameters:
        color - The new fill color

      • setFillColor

        public void setFillColor(String str)
        Sets the fill color of the value tag to the specified color, which is either a standard color name or a string in the form "#rrggbb". The string "none" can be used to specify an unfilled shape.
        Parameters:
        str - The new color expressed as a string

      • setLineColor

        public void setLineColor(Color color)
        Sets the line color of the value tag.
        Parameters:
        color - The new line color

      • setLineColor

        public void setLineColor(String str)
        Sets the line color of the value tag to the specified color, which is either a standard color name or a string in the form "#rrggbb".
        Parameters:
        str - The new color expressed as a string

      • setLineWeight

        public void setLineWeight(double weight)
        Sets the line weight for the value tag.
        Parameters:
        weight - The new line weight in points

      • setFont

        public void setFont(Font font)
        Sets the font for the value box.
        Parameters:
        font - The new font for the value box

      • setFont

        public void setFont(String str)
        Sets the font for the value box. In this version of setFont, the font is expressed as a string in the form 
            "family-style-size"
        Parameters:
        str - A string representing the font

      • setFontColor

        Parameters:

        Parameters:
        str - The new color expressed as a string
